name: Claude Code Sandbox
postCreateCommand: mkdir -p ~/.claude && cp $PWD/.devcontainer/claude-settings.json ~/.claude/settings.json && curl -fsSL https://claude.ai/install.sh | bash && export PATH="$HOME/.local/bin:$PATH" && claude mcp add --transport sse atlassian https://mcp.atlassian.com/v1/mcp && echo 'export PATH="$HOME/.local/bin:$PATH"' >> ~/.bashrc && echo 'alias clauded="claude --dangerously-skip-permissions"' >> ~/.bashrc && echo 'âœ… Claude Code Sandbox ready. Run: export AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID=... && export AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY=... then: clauded'
